unnormalised: Automotive News Flash: Traffic Rules Get a Desi Twist!
normalised: Automotive News Flash: Traffic Rules Get A Desi Twist!

unnormalised: Hey Bangalore drivers, listen up! Expect some changes faster than a Rajdhani Express. The traffic police, led by Dr. Kumar, are rolling out new regulations aimed at easing those infamous bottlenecks around Silk Board.
normalised: Hey Bangalore drivers, listen up! Expect some changes faster than a Rajdhani Express. The traffic police, led by Doctor Kumar, are rolling out new regulations aimed at easing those infamous bottlenecks around Silk Board.

unnormalised: Word on the street is stricter enforcement of lane discipline. Think double the fines, maybe even some community service like cleaning up a chai stall after you cause a jam!
normalised: Word on the street is stricter enforcement of lane discipline. Think double the fines, maybe even some community service like cleaning up a chai stall after you cause a jam!

unnormalised: Apparently, the new rules also target those notorious auto-rickshaw wallahs who think traffic lights are mere suggestions. Expect 'em to be more compliant, or face the music (read: hefty Rs. fines).
normalised: Apparently, the new rules also target those notorious auto-rickshaw wallahs who think traffic lights are mere suggestions. Expect 'em to be more compliant, or face the music (read: hefty rupee fines).

unnormalised: Also, they're cracking down on illegal parking. Even that tiny 100 sq ft space near your favourite dosa joint might now be a no-parking zone.
normalised: Also, they're cracking down on illegal parking. Even that tiny one hundred square foot space near your favourite dosa joint might now be a no-parking zone.

unnormalised: Rumour has it, they're considering a “peak hour only” rule for heavy vehicles on certain stretches. Bye-bye, slow-moving trucks during office rush!
normalised: Rumour has it, they're considering a “peak hour only” rule for heavy vehicles on certain stretches. Bye-bye, slow-moving trucks during office rush!

unnormalised: Let’s hope these changes bring some order to the chaos on our roads. Drive safe, and remember, "Atithi Devo Bhava" doesn't extend to letting everyone cut you off! Stay tuned for more updates, folks!
normalised: Let’s hope these changes bring some order to the chaos on our roads. Drive safe, and remember, "Atithi Devo Bhava" does not extend to letting everyone cut you off! Stay tuned for more updates, folks!
